title: Bay Area Metropolitan Transportation Commission
heading1: Inspire young Bay Area residents to engage with civic planning
body1: To help the MTC engage Millennial and Gen Z residents during the rollout of its Plan Bay Area 2050 vision, C&C developed custom creative for platforms where young audiences spend the most time. Using Stories-based creative, C&C drove robust engagement with the campaign's online game via Snapchat and Instagram, while also growing awareness through Spotify and YouTube.
heading2: Digital ads drove 98% of game traffic
body2: MTC received 10,000+ inputs to PBA 2050 from 3,000+ game players
body3: Snapchat, Facebook and IG stories gave us a platform to hook residents on the challenge of playing the game.
